item.title: Darlene Love - Christmas
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: D, F#m, G, A7, Bm
As performed by Darlene Love
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/HJmjt8pwp6I
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at:
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: David Bisbal - Mucho más allá
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords Used: G, D, Bm, Dm, C, F, Dm7, A, D, E, C#m, Cm, Bb
As performed by PANIC! AT THE DISCO, as featured in Disney's FROZEN II
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/YEm7Bj0L1eM
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/p/panic-at-the-disco/into-the-unknown/ **************************

item.title: Ella Fitzgerald - Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Ella Fitzgerald version
Using the chords: A7 Am B7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Saxophone Dreamsound - Driving Home for Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Driving Home For Christmas - Chris Rea
Using the chords: A Bm C#m7 D E7 Em F#m G I have simplified the chords to make the song accessible to more players. If you would prefer, you can replae the E7 chord tih an E and the C#m7 chord with a C#m.
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Ariana Grande - Santa Tell Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Santa Tell Me - Ariana Grande Written by Ariana Grande, Ilya Salmanzadeh and Savan Kotecha
Using the chords: A B7 Bm C D Em G G7 Gmaj7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Pogues - Fairytale of New York
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Fairytale Of New York - The Pogues Featuring Kirsty MacColl
*** Clean radio edit version ***
Using the chords: A Bm D G
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums / D DU DU (fast)
I have add the strum pattern for the whole song as it changes throughout.
If D DU DU is too fast just play single strums for the amount eg. D DU DU x3 = D D D
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Elvis Presley - Suspicious Minds
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Suspicious Minds - Elvis Presley Written by Mark James
Using the chords: Bm B7 C D D7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Pascal Fuhlbrügge - Nazimova
item.description:
For educational use. Created with chord letter names and lyrics so any non-transposing instrument can play along. Key of D.
Chords Used: D7, D, G, A7, Bm
As performed by Chuck Berry
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/w9VvFTdAI8k
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Video from www.videvo.net.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Baritone Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of A.
Chords Used: A, Bm, E, D, D#, D (alternate position), E (alternate position)
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
